attributes.action: Use Lundy Island for Dangerous Prisoners.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lundy Island is situated some 20 miles off the coast of North Devon. The nearest port being Bideford. The island would make an ideal prison for dangerous prisoners or illegal immigrants as the sea waters around the island, and tides, makes escape without a boat almost impossible.

Prisoners could be used in looking after the flora,fauna and wildlife on this remote island. Visitors can use the daily ferry from Bideford and a helicopter service could be provided locally.

It would bring much needed jobs to North Devon.
